item.title: Doppelganger
item.description: game: https://csaratakij.itch.io/doppelganger walkthrough: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t01DpSmG0PQ respository: https://github.com/CSaratakij/DG-Script-Only responsible: game system other member: Nutthan Lekprasan (game designer) Jetniphat Likhitwatthanasakun (artist) Introduction Before you read any further, I have to warn you. There are some spoiler of the puzzle in this game. Please play the game first to avoid any spoiler. This game is the entry for The Twentieth National Software Contest: NSC 2018. We manage to get the 2nd runner up in “Program for entertainment” .
